body_html:
Hi @vrv, @suiyuan2009 - a quick hello! I am still facing this problem implementing a GRU with word embedding and RMSProp. As originally noted by @kuza55, other optimizers - Adam, Adagrad, FTRL in my case - work. With RMSProp, I get the same issue. I am running TF on AWS g2.2xlarge with Python 3.4.3.

After seeing this thread today, I upgraded TensorFlow but that didn't fix the problem. Has the fix been uploaded?

Kindly advise!

body:
Hi @vrv, @suiyuan2009 - a quick hello! I am still facing this problem implementing a GRU with word embedding and RMSProp. As originally noted by @kuza55, other optimizers - Adam, Adagrad, FTRL in my case - work. With RMSProp, I get the same issue. I am running TF on AWS g2.2xlarge with Python 3.4.3. 

After seeing this thread today, I upgraded TensorFlow but that didn't fix the problem. Has the fix been uploaded?

Kindly advise!
